卷.definition: scroll; book; volume; chapter; examination paper; classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll

卷土重來.definition: lit. to return in a swirl of dust (idiom); fig. to regroup and come back even stronger; to make a comeback

卷地皮.definition: to plunder the land and extort from the peasant; corrupt practice

卷層雲.definition: cirrostratus (cloud); also written 捲層雲|卷层云[juan3 ceng2 yun2]

卷帙浩繁.definition: a huge amount (of books and papers)

卷簾門.definition: variant of 捲簾門|卷帘门[juan3lian2men2]

卷繞.definition: to wind; to coil; to spool; to loop around; winding

卷羽鵜鶘.definition: (bird species of China) Dalmatian pelican (Pelecanus crispus)

卷舌元音.definition: retroflex vowel (e.g. the final r of putonghua)

卷裹.definition: to wrap up; (fig.) to envelop; to swallow up

卷起.definition: variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
